mutants.code:
def calculate_min_initial_energy(checkpoints):
    init_min_energy = 1
    curr_energy = 0
    flag = 0
    for energy in checkpoints:
        curr_energy += energy
        if curr_energy <= 0:
            init_min_energy += abs(curr_energy) + 1
            curr_energy = 1
            flag = 1
    return 1 if flag == 0 else init_min_energy
